sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Users, Plus, Edit, Trash2, Search, Filter, Mail, Phone, Calendar, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; import { AuthController } from '../../controllers/AuthController'; interface Student { id: string; studentId: string; fullName: string; email: string; phone: string; major: string; year: number; status: 'active' | 'inactive' | 'graduated'; enrollmentDate: string; gpa: number; totalCredits: number; } const AdminStudentsView: React.FC = () => { const [students, setStudents] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); const [yearFilter, setYearFilter] = useState('all'); const [showCreateModal, setShowCreateModal] = useState(false); const [selectedStudent, setSelectedStudent] = useState(null); // Create form state const [createForm, setCreateForm] = useState({ studentId: '', fullName: '', email: '', phone: '', major: '', year: 1, status: 'active' as 'active' | 'inactive' | 'graduated' }); useEffect(() => { loadStudents(); }, []); const loadStudents = () => { // Mock students data const mockStudents: Student[] = [ { id: '1', studentId: '2024001', fullName: 'John Doe', email: 'john.doe@student.edu', phone: '+1-555-0101', major: 'Computer Science', year: 2, status: 'active', enrollmentDate: '2023-09-01', gpa: 3.8, totalCredits: 45 }, { id: '2', studentId: '2024002', fullName: 'Jane Smith', email: 'jane.smith@student.edu', phone: '+1-555-0102', major: 'Mathematics', year: 3, status: 'active', enrollmentDate: '2022-09-01', gpa: 3.9, totalCredits: 75 }, { id: '3', studentId: '2024003', fullName: 'Mike Johnson', email: 'mike.johnson@student.edu', phone: '+1-555-0103', major: 'Physics', year: 1, status: 'active', enrollmentDate: '2024-09-01', gpa: 3.5, totalCredits: 15 }, { id: '4', studentId: '2023001', fullName: 'Sarah Wilson', email: 'sarah.wilson@student.edu', phone: '+1-555-0104', major: 'Computer Science', year: 4, status: 'graduated', enrollmentDate: '2020-09-01', gpa: 3.7, totalCredits: 120 } ]; setStudents(mockStudents); setLoading(false); }; const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'active': return 'text-green-600 bg-green-100'; case 'inactive': return 'text-red-600 bg-red-100'; case 'graduated': return 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100'; default: return 'text-gray-600 bg-gray-100'; } }; const filteredStudents = students.filter(student => { const matchesSearch = student.fullName.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || student.studentId.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || student.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()); const matchesStatus = statusFilter === 'all' || student.status === statusFilter; const matchesYear = yearFilter === 'all' || student.year.toString() === yearFilter; return matchesSearch && matchesStatus && matchesYear; }); const handleCreateStudent = () => { if (!createForm.studentId || !createForm.fullName || !createForm.email) { alert('Please fill in all required fields'); return; } const newStudent: Student = { id: Date.now().toString(), studentId: createForm.studentId, fullName: createForm.fullName, email: createForm.email, phone: createForm.phone, major: createForm.major, year: createForm.year, status: createForm.status, enrollmentDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], gpa: 0.0, totalCredits: 0 }; setStudents(prev => [newStudent, ...prev]); // Reset form setCreateForm({ studentId: '', fullName: '', email: '', phone: '', major: '', year: 1, status: 'active' }); setShowCreateModal(false); }; const handleDeleteStudent = (id: string) => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this student?')) { setStudents(prev => prev.filter(student => student.id !== id)); } }; const handleStatusChange = (id: string, newStatus: 'active' | 'inactive' | 'graduated') => { setStudents(prev => prev.map(student => student.id === id ? { ...student, status: newStatus } : student ) ); }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Student Management

Add, edit, and manage student accounts and information.

{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Students

{students.length}

Active Students

{students.filter(s => s.status === 'active').length}

Graduated

{students.filter(s => s.status === 'graduated').length}

New This Year

{students.filter(s => s.year === 1).length}

{/* Filters */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md w-full focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-purple-500" />
{/* Students Table */}
{filteredStudents.map((student) => ( ))}
Student Contact Academic Info Status Actions
{student.fullName}
ID: {student.studentId}
{student.email}
{student.phone}
{student.major}
Year {student.year} • GPA: {student.gpa}
{/* Create Student Modal */} {showCreateModal && (

Add New Student

setCreateForm(prev => ({ ...prev, studentId: e.target.value }))} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-purple-500" placeholder="e.g., 2024001" />
setCreateForm(prev => ({ ...prev, fullName: e.target.value }))} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-purple-500" placeholder="John Doe" />
setCreateForm(prev => ({ ...prev, email: e.target.value }))} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-purple-500" placeholder="john.doe@student.edu" />
setCreateForm(prev => ({ ...prev, phone: e.target.value }))} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-purple-500" placeholder="+1-555-0101" />
setCreateForm(prev => ({ ...prev, major: e.target.value }))} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:border-purple-500" placeholder="Computer Science" />
)} {/* Student Details Modal */} {selectedStudent && (

Student Details

Student ID

{selectedStudent.studentId}

Full Name

{selectedStudent.fullName}

Email

{selectedStudent.email}

Phone

{selectedStudent.phone}

Major

{selectedStudent.major}

Year

Year {selectedStudent.year}

GPA

{selectedStudent.gpa}

Total Credits

{selectedStudent.totalCredits}

Enrollment Date

{selectedStudent.enrollmentDate}

)}
); }; export default AdminStudentsView;
